text: Edward A. Buchanan (born October 19, 1967) is an American politician, attorney, and military veteran. In 2018, he became the Wyoming Secretary of State. Buchanan was a member and past Speaker of the Wyoming House of Representatives. ==References== ==Other websites== *Wyoming House page on Buchanan *Project Vote Smart bio Category:1967 births Category:American Protestants Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Wyoming Category:Military people from Florida Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Military people from Wyoming
title: Edward Buchanan
